en_text: This presence...
jp_text: この気配 バジオウですか？
google_translated: Is this a sign of basiow?

en_text: No. Most likely, it's that boy.
jp_text: いや 恐らく あの少年だ
google_translated: No pretty boy

en_text: The true battle seems to be starting in there.
jp_text: あそこでも 本当の戦いが始まりそうだな
google_translated: That's why the real battle seems to start

en_text: To weave together my breaking heart
jp_text: 壊れそうな心 紡ぐように
google_translated: To be broken

en_text: The moon I see before my eyes
jp_text: 目の前には月が映し出す
google_translated: The moon projected in front of you

en_text: I won't turn away from my tearful memories
jp_text: 涙が残した記憶さえも
google_translated: Even the memory that tears left

en_text: nor the past where we laughed together
jp_text: 笑いあった過去さえ振り向かない
google_translated: Even a laughing past does not turn around

en_text: Voice of you sadness is sure to turn into strength
jp_text: 悲しみならきっと 強さに変わるはず
google_translated: Sadness should surely change to strength

en_text: I won't stop if i jump high enough, i'm sure i'll reach beyond the sky
jp_text: 高く翔べばきっと空の向こうに届く
google_translated: It will soon reach the sky beyond the sky

en_text: This is the sword I inherited from Piao!
jp_text: これは 漂から受け継いだ剣だ！
google_translated: This is a sword that is inherited from drifting!

en_text: Now that all the blood has been drained from it,
jp_text: 血は流し尽くした ここから出せるものは ただひとつ
google_translated: Blood is exhausted What can be exhausted from here
